@graph.name: GigaScience-IEDB-PepQuery-Neoantigen
@graph.description:
Predict binding using IEDB and check novelty peptides with PepQuery

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Neoantigen 7: IEDB binding PepQuery Validated Neopeptides](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/proteomics/tutorials/neoantigen-7-hla-binding-novel-peptides/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes a [Galaxy Workflow Report](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/galaxy/workflows_report_view.html)
